title: David Spares Saul in the Cave
summary: While hiding in a cave, David has the chance to kill Saul but only cuts off a corner of his robe. He later confronts Saul, proving his loyalty. Saul weeps, admits David’s righteousness, and acknowledges him as future king.

faq.question: Why didn’t David kill Saul?
faq.answer: Because he respected Saul as the Lord’s anointed and didn’t want to sin against God.

faq.question: How did Saul react to David’s mercy?
faq.answer: He wept and admitted that David was more righteous, acknowledging David would be king.
